actions.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill relating to the factors used in determining the allocation of the total allowable levels of foreign fishing permitted in the United States fishery conservation zone.

summary.text: Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976 to require the Secretary of State to consider such other fishery matters as the Secretary of State, in cooperation with the Secretary of Commerce, deems appropriate. (Current law requires the Secretary of State to consider such other matters, not limited to fishery matters, as the Secretary of State, in cooperation with the Secretary of Commerce, deems appropriate.)

titles.title: A bill relating to the factors used in determining the allocation of the total allowable levels of foreign fishing permitted in the United States fishery conservation zone.
